trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
Unprotect-CmsMessage
Unprotect-CmsMessage
SYNOPSIS
Decrypts content that has been encrypted by using the Cryptographic Message Syntax format.
trans-unit.target: 解密已加密的使用密碼編譯訊息語法格式的內容。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
ByWinEvent (Default)
ByContent
ByPath
ByLiteralPath
DESCRIPTION
The **Unprotect-CmsMessage** cmdlet decrypts content that has been encrypted by using the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) format.
trans-unit.target: **解除 CmsMessage** 指令程式會解密已加密的使用密碼編譯訊息語法 (CMS) 格式的內容。

trans-unit.source: The CMS cmdlets support encryption and decryption of content using the IETF standard format for cryptographically protecting messages, as documented by RFC5652http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5652.
trans-unit.target: CMS cmdlet 支援加密和解密的密碼編譯保護訊息，使用 IETF 標準格式，由 RFC5652 http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5652 所述的內容。

trans-unit.source: The CMS encryption standard uses public key cryptography, where the keys used to encrypt content (the public key) and the keys used to decrypt content (the private key) are separate.
trans-unit.target: 標準 CMS 加密使用公開金鑰加密，其中用來加密的內容 （公開金鑰） 的金鑰和解密的內容 （私密金鑰） 所用的索引鍵是不同。

trans-unit.source: Your public key can be shared widely, and is not sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: 公開金鑰可以廣泛共用，並非機密資料。

trans-unit.source: If any content is encrypted with this public key, only your private key can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 如有任何內容以此公開金鑰加密，只有您的私密金鑰可以解密。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Public Key Cryptography, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Public-key_cryptographyhttp://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Public-key_cryptography.
trans-unit.target: 如需公開金鑰加密的詳細資訊，請參閱 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Public-key_cryptographyhttp: / / en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Public-key_cryptography。

trans-unit.source: **Unprotect-CmsMessage** decrypts content that has been encrypted in CMS format.
trans-unit.target: **取消保護 CmsMessage** 解密已加密的 CMS 格式的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can run this cmdlet to decrypt content that you have encrypted by running the Protect-CmsMessage cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行這個指令程式可執行保護 CmsMessage cmdlet 已加密的內容解密。

trans-unit.source: You can specify content that you want to decrypt as a string, by the encryption event log record ID number, or by path to the encrypted content.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定您想要為字串時，加密事件記錄檔記錄的識別碼，或路徑已加密的內容解密的內容。

trans-unit.source: The **Unprotect-CmsMessage** cmdlet returns the decrypted content.
trans-unit.target: **解除 CmsMessage** 指令程式可傳回解密的內容。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
Example 1: Decrypt a message
In the following example, you decrypt content that is located at the literal path C:\Users\Test\Documents\PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，您必須解密位於 C:\Users\Test\Documents\PowerShell ISE 的常值路徑的內容。

trans-unit.source: For the value of the required *To* parameter, this example uses the thumbprint of the certificate that was used to perform the encryption.
trans-unit.target: 值的必要 *至* 參數，此範例會使用用來執行加密憑證的指紋。

trans-unit.source: The decrypted message, "Try the new Break All command," is the result.
trans-unit.target: 解密的訊息，「 試試看新中斷所有的命令 」 是結果。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
-Content
Specifies an encrypted string, or a variable containing an encrypted string.
trans-unit.target: 指定加密的字串或包含加密的字串的變數。

trans-unit.source: -EventLogRecord
Specifies an event log record ID that represents a CMS encryption operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定代表 CMS 加密作業的事件記錄檔記錄識別碼。

trans-unit.source: -IncludeContext
@{Text=}
-LiteralPath
Specifies the path to encrypted content that you want to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 指定您想要解密的加密內容的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Unlike *Path*, the value of *LiteralPath* is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 *路徑*, ，值 *LiteralPath* 完全依照其輸入使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -Path
Specifies the path to encrypted content that you want to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 指定您想要解密的加密內容的路徑。

trans-unit.source: -To
Specifies one or more CMS message recipients, identified in any of the following formats.
trans-unit.target: 指定一或多個 CMS 訊息收件者，識別下列任一形式。

trans-unit.source: An actual certificate (as retrieved from the certificate provider).
trans-unit.target: 實際的憑證 （做為憑證提供者從擷取）。

trans-unit.source: Path to the a file containing the certificate.
Path to a directory containing the certificate.
Thumbprint of the certificate (used to look in the certificate store).
trans-unit.target: （用來尋找憑證存放區中） 的憑證指紋。

trans-unit.source: Subject name of the certificate (used to look in the certificate store).
trans-unit.target: （用來尋找憑證存放區中） 的憑證主體名稱。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters

This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
You can pipe an object containing encrypted content to **Unprotect-CmsMessage**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送物件，其中包含要加密的內容 **解除 CmsMessage**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
NOTES
RELATED LINKS
about_Providers
Get-CmsMessage
Protect-CmsMessage
